description: This table contains the history of enrollment status change effective dates for a patient in a research study.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the enrollment record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the enrollment status change date in the enrollment record. Together with ENROLL_ID, this forms the foreign key to the ENROLL_STAT_CHNG_DT_HX table

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple enrollment status change dates associated with the enrollment record and the ENROLL_STAT_CHNG_HX_C from the ENROLL_STAT_CHNG_HX table

columns.name: HX_ENROLL_STAT_CHNG_DATE
columns.description: The effective date of an enrollment status change in the history of an enrollment record.
